values: A diet is the food regularly eaten by a person.
His diet mostly consists of fruits and vegetables.
n. 饮食；食物；规定饮食

vi. 节食

饮食，食物；规定饮食
To diet is to eat a particular type or amount of food in order to lose weight or improve health.
A diet is the kinds of food that a person, animal, or community habitually eats.
